mapper.select: SELECT * , (SELECT pName FROM product WHERE cart.pNo = product.pNo) as pName , (SELECT pPrice FROM product WHERE cart.pNo = product.pNo) as pPrice FROM cart WHERE uNo = #{uNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE uNo = #{uNo} AND (SELECT pType FROM product WHERE cart.pNo = product.pNo) != 'G'
SELECT * , (SELECT pName FROM product WHERE cart.pNo = product.pNo) as pName , (SELECT pPrice FROM product WHERE cart.pNo = product.pNo) as pPrice FROM cart WHERE cNo = #{cNo}
SELECT SUM(pPrice*cCount) as total FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.pNo = p.pNo WHERE uNo = #{uNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE uNo = #{uNo} AND (SELECT pType FROM product WHERE cart.pNo = product.pNo) = 'G'
